Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the sale or promotional distribution of machetes to minors
Summary: Prohibits the sale or promotional distribution of machetes to minors; defines machete as a large heavy knife with a broad blade, used primarily for cutting brush or vegetation.
LawCode: Amd ยง399-qq, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale or promotional distribution of machetes to minors
